channel.title: Layer 2 Etherchannel - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Layer 2 Etherchannel Manual Layer 2 EtherChannel Add the correct channel-group configuration command to each physical interface on each switch, all with the on keyword, and all with the same number. The on keyword tells the switches to place a physical interface into an EtherChannel, and The number identifies the PortChannel interface number that the interface should be a part of. EtherChannel, PortChannel, and Channel-group basically mean the same thing. channel-group number on the neighboring switch can differ.
